description: This file defines mock classes for IUSBDevice interface and its notification callbacks, used for testing USB device interactions in the project.

classes.name: USBDeviceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IUSBDevice interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: GetDeviceList
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of connected USB devices.

methods.name: GetDeviceInfo
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of information for a specific device.

methods.name: BindDriver
methods.description: Mocks binding a driver to a device.

methods.name: UnbindDriver
methods.description: Mocks unbinding a driver from a device.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Mocks reference counting for object lifetime management.

methods.name: QueryInterface
methods.description: Mocks querying a specific interface from the object.

classes.name: USBDeviceNotificationMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the USB device notification interface for testing notifications.

methods.name: OnDevicePluggedIn
methods.description: Mocks the callback for device plugged in event.

methods.name: OnDevicePluggedOut
methods.description: Mocks the callback for device unplugged event.
